article.title: Georgia Tech Receives Nearly $15 Million Sensors and Countermeasures Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Georgia Tech Applied Research Corporation, Atlanta, Georgia, was awarded a nearly $15 million contract for the Advanced Airlift Tactics and Training Center sensor/countermeasures engineering and training. The U.S. Air Force 55th Contracting Squadron, Offutt Air Force Base, Nebraska, is the contracting activity.
